about_the_game:
Lab Bio-Terror - In this shoot em all game, you are a special agent who was sent to clean up a secret laboratory. Scientists screwed up, and it's up to you to eliminate the consequences of the leak of a dangerous virus! Shoot a dangerous infection and remember that access to the next level will open after the complete destruction of enemies on the current one! Clear floor after floor of evil insects and crazy people and get to the womb of the hive to stop this nightmare once and for all!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics by Reatun
- Nice soundtrack by Garganola07

Clear floor after floor of evil insects and crazy people and get to the womb of the hive to stop this nightmare once and for all!

name: Lab Bio-Terror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
